### Exploring the drivers of migration in the Lower Mekong Region through the nightlights lens

<br>
<br>

The objective of this project is to use open data to provide tools that help tackling social issues, exploring and estimating information using night lights data as a predictor of past (where data doesn't exist) and future changes.
